0.text: Innate: Periodically, when Blitzcrank is damaged to  30% maximum health, he first generates a  shield equal to  30% of maximum mana, lasting up to 10 seconds.

Active: Blitzcrank fires his right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing them magic damage,  stunning them for 0.65 seconds, and  pulling them towards Blitzcrank, during which they are  revealed.

1.text: Blitzcrank is  unable to move or attack while Rocket Grab is in flight.

0.text: Active: Blitzcrank shifts into overdrive, gaining  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds and  bonus movement speed that decays to 10% over the first 2.5 seconds.

1.text: When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank is  slowed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: Active: Blitzcrank's next basic attack within 5 seconds has an  uncancellable windup, deals 100% AD bonus physical damage and  knocks up the target for 1 second.

1.text: Power Fist  resets Blitzcrank's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: While Static Field is not on cooldown, Blitzcrank's basic attacks on-hit apply a stack, stacking up to 3 times. After every 1 second, 1 stack is consumed to deal magic damage.

1.text: Active: Blitzcrank detonates a static field, completely destroying damage-mitigating  shields of nearby enemies before dealing them magic damage and  silencing them for 0.5 seconds.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Devotion: Grant allied champions within 850 radius a shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – DEVOTION: Grant allied champions within  850 radius a  shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Consecrate: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2 bonus resistances for this item's passive effect, Consecrate.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONSECRATE: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+250 health
+250 mana
+35 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+200% base health regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.

Passive: While Static Field is not on cooldown, Blitzcrank's basic attacks on-hit apply a stack, stacking up to 3 times. After every 1 second, 1 stack is consumed to deal magic damage.

1.concerningText: Active: Blitzcrank detonates a static field, completely destroying damage-mitigating  shields of nearby enemies before dealing them magic damage and  silencing them for 0.5 seconds.

0.concerningText: Active: Blitzcrank fires his right hand in the target direction that catches the first enemy hit, dealing them magic damage,  stunning them for 0.65 seconds, and  pulling them towards Blitzcrank, during which they are  revealed.
